articles.title: Caroline Flack's death inquest scheduled to conclude six months after tragic suicide - Mirror Online
articles.description: The inquest into Caroline Flack's death in February has been set for this summer - six months after she was found dead at her flat in London
articles.content:
A date has been set for the inquest into Caroline Flack 's death - six months after she took her own life at her flat in London.
The Love Island host's cause of death was revealed as suicide by hang… [+2685 chars]

articles.author: Andrea Tonks
articles.title: Piers Morgan: 'I'd like to apologise' GMB host addresses Boris Johnson remark - Express.co.uk
articles.description: PIERS MORGAN - who presents Good Morning Britain - has apologised for his comments about Boris Johson and Worzel Gummidge during today's show on Twitter today.
